Character Modify Commands.
setlevel - Used to set player Level.
settitle - Used to set player Level.
setname - Used to set player Name.
setkarma - Used to set player Karma.
setpkkills - Used to set player pk count.
setpvpkills - Used to set player pvp count.
rec - Used to set player rec count.
setnoble - Used to make player noblesse.
setsex - Used to set player sex.
setcolor - Used to set player name color.
setfame - Used to set player fame count.
set_bang - Used to set player pc bang count.
setheroaura - Used to set player look like hero before relog.
sethero - Used to set player hero with skills before relog.
setinvul - Used to set player invulnerable.
transform - Used to set player transform id.
poly / unpoly - Used to polymorf player into npc by npcId.
Punishment Commands, Page 3 Tournament Commands, Page 5
